channel.title: [Suggest] 508 and 317 help board [suggest]
channel.description:
Okay i am really sorry if this upsets anyone because it is in the wrong section, but please i am just as upset.
Why?
Because i dont know much about 508's and they are filling up the server help section! Thats why!
What do you want us to do about it?
I think the dude that runs this forum should add a child board to the server help section called "508 Help" and "317 Help"
Hmm... thats a good idea =]
Yes i agree
